title: Best of The Herd: 10/09/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 10/09/2019
description:
Colin says there are 10 QBs in the NFL that have leverage in contract negotiations and Dak Prescott is not one of them. He argues that the Browns have actually gotten some breaks this year and are the luckiest teams in the NFL. He thinks the seven NFL execs who would take Patrick Mahomes over Tom Brady to win one game are clearly incompetent. Plus, FS1 host and Chiefs fan Nick Wright yells at Colin for being so wrong on Mahomes and Brady.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
